posts.post_content:
*"Most people give this card too little credit. Not that it is great persay but majinara has the right idea. You let it attack, make sure it is not blocked, then before damage it dealt you throw on some buffs and sink as much life as you are able to into it and in many cases win the game right there."*   
   
The problem with this is that you have to play pump spells, which tend to be bad in constructed. Also, the same things could be said of [Putrid Leech](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Putrid Leech), which is ridiculously superior.
